name: Cognito Meetups
body:
# **Cognito Meetups Portlets**

This provides enhancement to the social networking portlets of Liferay .It enhances the Liferay Metups portlet to add 
tagging ,asset and search integration to the same.

_just a small effort on that part_

cheers
**Gaurav**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
